xwikidoc.reference: DemoContent.Blog.Updating the XWiki UI using a bit of JavaScript and Velocity code
xwikidoc.name: Updating the XWiki UI using a bit of JavaScript and Velocity code
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Updating the XWiki UI using a bit of JavaScript and Velocity code

object.name: DemoContent.Blog.Updating the XWiki UI using a bit of JavaScript and Velocity code

category.name: category
category.sql: select doc.name from XWikiDocument doc, BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className = 'Blog.CategoryClass' and doc.fullName not in ('Blog.CategoryTemplate', 'Blog.Categories')

property.extract: It's natural that depending on the actions of users, we want to also update the UI. For example the click of a button, the selection of a checkbox or the scroll of a page. These tasks can be easily achieved using the XWiki platform and some basic web technologies know-how.

property.title: Updating the XWiki UI using a bit of JavaScript and Velocity code
